0.post_text:
Hi Everyone, thank you for the strong show of support for our 9th consecutive Christmas Open House. We felt the love, you guys are the best! Thank you for helping us make wishes come true this Christmas at The Salvation Army.

Not to forget, come in for some live music by our local talents, Rachael Teo and Jonathan Meur, performing tomorrow, 4pm, Starbucks Raffles City. See you!

2.post_text:
Who’s in?
5pm-7pm Enjoy any tall-size Christmas promotional beverage on the house and make a donation of your choice to The Salvation Army!

What’s more, 2 exclusive Starbucks tumblers are up for sale starting today. Designed by local personalities – singer songwriter Don Richmond and celebrity photographer Kevin Ou, proceeds from each tumbler sale go to The Salvation Army.
 
*Event in Singapore only. Christmas beverages include Toffee Nut Latte, Peppermint Mocha & Cranberry White Chocolate Mocha.

*Valid at all stores, while stocks last only. Terms & conditions apply.

15.post_text:
Hi guys! Step into our cafes for a wholesome meal. New in stores, our wraps are ideal for a lunch appointment or late afternoon snack with a friend or colleague. 
Perk yourself up with a hearty, satisfying wrap - there’s something for everyone! 

Introducing 3 flavors: 

The Meat Lovers Spinach Wrap, packed with roast beef, pastrami, turkey ham, roast chicken, hard boiled egg, gherkin and cheddar, is served with smoky barbecue dip.

The Roasted Chicken & Vegetables Wrap served with mushroom truffle dip, consists of chunky roasted chicken, medley of zucchini, eggplant, capsicum, carrots, mushrooms and cheddar.

And finally, for vegetarians, grab a Portobello & Roasted Vegetables Tomato Wrap, filled with zucchini, eggplant, capsicum, carrot with herbs & spices, and cheddar - served with a spinach and cheese dip. 

Dig in! (:

17.post_text:
In the spirit of Christmas, let’s give back to those who are in need. Join us as various local artistes serenade us with Christmas tunes in the few Saturdays to come, starting tomorrow - at Starbucks Raffles City, 4pm.
 
In the line-up are:
24 Nov – The Ukulele Girls
1 Dec – Deon and Another Sunday Afternoon
8 Dec – Rachael Teo and Jonathan Meur
15 Dec – Kevin Mathews & Friends 
 
Show some love and grab a copy of the CD from all our stores! After all, it’s Christmas. :)
And remember, all proceeds from the sale of Christmas in Singapore will be donated to Rare Disorders Society, Singapore.

18.post_text:
Today we’d like to honour the fans, baristas and friends who have ardently supported us at Starbucks Orchard Parade Hotel.
Many wonderful memories have been made at this beloved Starbucks café, but as some good things must come to an end, we regret to announce the closure of this store. 
Our last day of operations is Monday, 26 Nov.

You’ve made it feel like home for us, thank you for your friendship through all these years.
Please find us right across the road at Starbucks Delfi Orchard instead.
We’re never far for your daily cuppa (:

Enjoy the ease and convenience of checking your Starbucks Card rewards, finding a store near you, sending your loved ones a Starbucks Card eGift and more, in just a tap!
 
Available now in the App Store, download our new Starbucks Singapore App for iPhone today! 
 
P/S: App only valid for iOS5 and above.

20.post_text:
Singapore’s favorite a cappella group, Vocaluptuous launches its third Christmas album, ‘Tis The Season’, featuring ten exciting new songs to celebrate the coming festive season. 
In the spirit of giving, this CD aims to raise S$80,000 in aid of The Assisi Hospice.

Remember the less fortunate this Christmas. Extend a helping hand by buying this CD, available in all our stores featuring local talent Vocaluptuous. Each CD retails at $20 each, with proceeds going to The Assisi Hospice.

21.post_text:
This Christmas, there’s a brand new album compilation with a difference - Singaporean independent musicians (including Don Richmond, Jack & Rai, amongst others) perform Christmas songs for charity. 

All proceeds from the sale of Christmas in Singapore will be donated to Rare Disorders Society, Singapore. Find out more about the RDSS at http://www.rdss.org.sg/ 

Each CD costs $15 and it’s now available in all our stores. Come show some love guys!

24.post_text: Start your week right with Cranberry White Chocolate Mocha, the perfect sweet treat to sip during this season. Starbucks® signature espresso is combined with freshly steamed milk and luscious white chocolate, then topped with whipped cream, a tart cranberry drizzle and crystallized cranberry sugar. Delish and the best antidote for Monday blues!
